title: Fans of NHL hockey in Canada 2014 , by age group
summary: This is a multi-line chart with 2 lines representing Yes, and No. The y axis denotes Share of respondents and the x axis denotes Year.
Overall No is gradually increasing, Yes is gradually decreasing,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Yes, and lastly, 2. No.
Overall across the Year, Yes mostly maintained the highest Share of respondents when compared to others with a mean value of 52.33, and it peaked at 18-34_years.
No mostly had the least Share of respondents with a mean value of 47.67, which peaked at 65+_years with a value of 53.0.
